meanings.definition: A tall cupboard or cabinet in which clothes may be hung or stored.
meanings.sent1: She opened the wardrobe to pick out her favorite dress.
meanings.sent2: His wardrobe was filled with colorful shirts and pants.
meanings.sent3: The wardrobe was so full, it almost burst open!
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was like a treasure chest of fashion.
meanings.sent5: The wardrobe stood tall, guarding her clothes like a loyal friend.

meanings.definition: A person's entire collection of clothes.
meanings.sent1: His wardrobe consisted of jeans, t-shirts, and sneakers.
meanings.sent2: She needed to update her wardrobe for the new season.
meanings.sent3: His wardrobe was so big, it could dress a whole town!
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a reflection of her unique style.
meanings.sent5: The wardrobe overflowed with memories and fashion choices.

meanings.definition: A room or compartment where clothes are kept.
meanings.sent1: The wardrobe in her bedroom was neatly organized.
meanings.sent2: She walked into the wardrobe to select her outfit for the day.
meanings.sent3: The wardrobe was so cozy, it felt like a secret hideout.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a gateway to her personal style.
meanings.sent5: The wardrobe smelled of lavender and clean clothes.
